title: IRS clarifies rules on crypto staking rewards
description:
The Internal Revenue Service issued new guidelines on July 31, outlining its stance on taxing cryptocurrency staking rewards. The new directives stipulate that taxpayers who engage in staking of cryptocurrency native to a proof-of-stake blockchain and subsequently receive additional cryptocurrency units as validation rewards are required to include the value of these rewards in their […]

The post IRS clarifies rules on crypto staking rewards appeared first on CryptoSlate.
